sentence.Network_en: The bar association condemned the lawyer's actions but did not disbar him.
sentence.Network_cn: 律师协会谴责了这个律师的行为,但没有取消他的律师资格.

sentence.Network_en: The Referee Commission may disbar any official or competitor who does not comply with this regulation.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何大会职员及选手未按规定穿著者,裁判委员会可取消其资格.

list.abs: should the Referee consider any contestant's hair too long and / or unclean , he may disbar the contestant from the bout .如果主审认为选手头发太长或不干净，可以取消该选手出赛。
希高翻译-法律专业词汇中英对照二 ... 见习大律师 pupil 取消大律师资格 disbarred 委托大律师 instruct counsel.
his poor health disbarred him from further service in army .因身体欠佳，他不能继续在军队服役。
disband 解散遣散解体各散东西disbandment disbar 除牌取消资格disbarred disbelief 疑不信可疑怀疑思疑疑惑蹊跷不可信不相信不信.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in sense 2): from dis- 'away' + bar

means.word_mean: 1. remove from the bar; expel from the practice of law by official action;

auth_sentence.content: Why don't we give them a stonking rise but then disbar them from any other earnings?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why don't we give them a stonking rise but then disbar them from any other earnings?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why don't we give them a stonking rise but then disbar them from any other earnings?

sentences.en: The lawyer was disbarred from practice when he was round guilty of unlawful acts.
sentences.cn: 这个年青律师被发现有犯罪行为时，被取消执业资格。
